content:
# I have successfully extracted 2 units of stone bricks from the furnace. The furnace is currently working and has 4 units of coal remaining. However, it shows that there are no more stones to smelt, indicating that it has processed all available stone.

# To keep the production going, I need to gather more stone. I will locate a nearby stone resource and harvest it.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Locate the nearest stone resource
move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone resource position
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Collect more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone.
